column4: Many thanks for reaching out. We are glad that you found us. We have done some pre-eliminary models of the emissions reduction based on expert estimates, which show a significant impact on the single-use packaging elimination and therefore the CO2 emissions. Nevertheless, since the technology is brand new and it hasn’t been in operation yet, the real impact is to be seen. We are going to do the pilot project (first “ecosystem” = connecting the producers and retailers+logistics) here in the Czech Republic in September/October this year, so we will have the real data once it’s running.
